title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5700.3 - Tolls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5700.3 - Tolls

State Regulations

Traffic shall be permitted in or upon vehicular crossings
only upon the payment of such tolls and other charges, and under such
circumstances, as may from time to time be prescribed by the authority. It is
unlawful for any person to refuse to pay, or to evade or attempt to evade the
payment of such tolls or other charges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

5700.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
